supporting_quotes: Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund 2000–2004
Köhler was appointed managing director and chairman of the executive board of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) in 2000.

events.canonical_org_name: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD)
supporting_quotes: President of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development 1998–2000
In September 1998 Köhler was appointed president of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development,
President of the Deutscher Sparkassen- und Giroverband 1993–1998
Between 1993 and 1998 he served as president of the association of savings banks in Germany, Deutscher Sparkassen- und Giroverband.
Secretary of State in the Ministry of Finance 1990–1993
Köhler was Secretary of State in the Federal Ministry of Finance from 1990 to 1993
Political party Christian Democratic Union (1981–2025)
A member of the CDU from 1981, Köhler was Secretary of State in the Federal Ministry of Finance from 1990 to 1993
he was a scientific research assistant at the Institut für Angewandte Wirtschaftsforschung from 1969 to 1976
Köhler joined the civil service in 1976, when he was employed in the Federal Ministry of Economics
In 1981, he was employed in the Staatskanzlei des Landes Schleswig-Holstein (chancellery of the state government of Schleswig-Holstein)

roles: Director General for Financial Policy and Federal Industrial Interests
supporting_quotes: Köhler rose to Director General for financial policy and federal industrial interests in 1987

roles: Director General for Currency and Credit
supporting_quotes: In 1989 he became Director General for currency and credit

roles: Member of the High-Level Panel on the Post-2015 Development Agenda
supporting_quotes: From 2012 to 2013, Köhler served on the UN Secretary-General's High-level Panel on the Post-2015 Development Agenda.
Beginning in 2016, Köhler co-chaired, together with former UN Secretary-General Kofi Annan, a Special Panel of the African Development Bank (AfDB)
Scope Foundation, Member of the Honorary Board (as of 2020)
Club of Madrid, Member

roles: Member of the Board of Trustees
supporting_quotes: Konrad Adenauer Foundation (KAS), Member of the Board of Trustees

roles: Member of the Board of Trustees
supporting_quotes: Wittenberg Center for Global Ethics, Member of the Board of Trustees (as of 2011)
Emerging Markets Forum (EMF), Co-chair
Opera Village Africa, Honorary Patron

roles: Member of the Board of Trustees
supporting_quotes: Stiftung Weltethos (Global Ethics Foundation), Member of the Board of Trustees*
Club of Rome, Honorary Member
University of Tübingen, Honorary Senator
Köhler was a member of the Protestant Church in Germany.

roles: Recipient of the Order of Merit of Baden-Württemberg
supporting_quotes: Order of Merit of Baden-Württemberg (2002)

supporting_quotes: Grand Decoration of Honour in Gold with Star for Services to the Republic of Austria (2003)

roles: Recipient of the Grand Collar of the Order of Prince Henry

supporting_quotes: The National German Sustainability Award (2014)
